slideshow.subtitle:
Plan, execute and analyze your soaring flights.

slideshow.title: SeeYou - maps that a soaring pilot needs
slideshow.subtitle:
Choose between terrain, outdoor or satellite map. Airspace, airports, mountain peeks and passes are included. 

<TrialBtn />

slideshow.title: SeeYou - plan your flights
slideshow.subtitle:
Our redesigned task planner makes it easy to set tasks based on weather forecasts from TopMeteo or Skysight.

slideshow.title: SeeYou - analyze your flights
slideshow.subtitle:
Improve your flying based on facts that refine your intuition.

sections.title: SeeYou - Flight Analysis
sections.body:
SeeYou enables you to analyze and learn from your soaring flights made by soaring pilots for soaring pilots. 

<TrialBtn />
